about_the_game:
Add-on for Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii that adds legendary characters like Kazuma Kiryu and Daigo Dojima to your pirate ship crew.

■ STRONGEST PIRATE CREW SET
- Crewmate: Kazuma Kiryu
- Crewmate: Daigo Dojima
- Crewmate: Yuki
- Crewmate: Ono Michio

■ ENTHUSIASTIC SUPPORTERS SET
- Supporter: Futoshi Shimano
- Supporter: Tsukasa Sagawa
- Supporter: Homare Nishitani
- Supporter: Nugget

*You must own a copy of Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii in order to use this add-on content. Please update the game by downloading the latest patch and updating before using it.
*Please be aware that the additional content included in this pack is also sold in separate sets or editions.
*The “Legendary Pirate Crew Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The contents of the "Legendary Pirate Crew Pack" will not be counted toward in-game achievements.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Tobacco and Alcohol.
